snippet: At least seven people were killed early Tuesday in a militant attack on a power grid station outside Peshawar, the provincial capital of insurgency-riven Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Province.
abstract: At least seven people are killed in militant attack on power grid station outside Peshawar, Pakistan; militants are assumed to be Taliban.
lead_paragraph: At least seven people were killed early Tuesday in a militant attack on a power grid station outside Peshawar, the provincial capital of insurgency-riven Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Province.

headline.seo: Pakistan: Attack on Power Station Leaves 7 Dead and a City Dark
headline.main: Pakistan: Attack on Power Station Leaves 7 Dead and a City Dark
headline.print_headline:
Pakistan: Attack on Power Station
Leaves 7 Dead and a City Dark
